                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                JavaGitException
Description copied from interface: IGitBranch
Does a basic git-branch without any options. Displays branches.

Specified by:
branch in interface IGitBranch
Parameters:
repoPath - A File instance for the path to the repository. If null is passed, a NullPointerException will be thrown.
Returns:
The result of the git branch.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - There are many reasons for which an IOException may be thrown. Examples include:
  • a directory doesn't exist
  • a command is not found on the PATH
JavaGitException - Thrown when there is an error executing git-branch.

public GitBranchResponseImpl deleteBranch(java.io.File repoPath,
                                          boolean forceDelete,
                                          boolean remote,
                                          Ref branchName)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          JavaGitException
Description copied from interface: IGitBranch
Deletes the specified branch using the -d or -D command line option.

Specified by:
deleteBranch in interface IGitBranch
Parameters:
repoPath - A File instance for the path to the repository. If null is passed, a NullPointerException will be thrown.
forceDelete - True if force delete option -D should be used, false if -d should be used.
remote - True if delete branch should be acted upon a remote branch.
branchName - A branch to be deleted.
Returns:
The result of the git-branch with delete option.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - There are many reasons for which an IOException may be thrown. Examples include:
  • a directory doesn't exist
  • access to a file is denied
  • a command is not found on the PATH
JavaGitException - Thrown when there is an error executing git-branch.

renameBranch in interface IGitBranch
Parameters:

forceRename - True if force rename option -M should be used. False if -m should be used.
newName - When renaming the current branch to a new branch name, this is the new branch name.

The result of the git branch with -m option.

branchProcess

public GitBranchResponseImpl branchProcess(java.io.File repoPath,
                                           GitBranchOptions options,
                                           Ref arg1,
                                           Ref arg2,
                                           java.util.List<Ref> branchList)
                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                           JavaGitException
Process the git-branch command, to show/delete/create/rename branches.

Parameters:
repoPath - A File instance for the path to the repository. If null is passed, a NullPointerException will be thrown.
options - The options to include on the command line.
arg1 - When renaming a branch to a different name, this is the old branch. When creating a branch this the branch name.
arg2 - When renaming a branch to a new branch name, this is the new branch name. When creating a branch, this is the head to start from.
branchList - List of branches need to be deleted.
Returns:
The result of the git branch.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - There are many reasons for which an IOException may be thrown. Examples include:
  • a directory doesn't exist
  • a command is not found on the PATH
JavaGitException - Thrown when there is an error executing git-branch.

buildCommand

protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> buildCommand(GitBranchOptions options,
                                                        Ref arg1,
                                                        Ref arg2,
                                                        java.util.List<Ref> branchList)
Builds a list of command arguments to pass to ProcessBuilder.

Parameters:
options - The options to include on the command line.
arg1 - When renaming a branch to a different name, this is the old branch. When creating a branch this the branch name.
arg2 - When renaming a branch to a new branch name, this is the new branch name. When creating a branch, this is the head to start from.
branchList - List of branches need to be deleted.
Returns:
A list of the individual arguments to pass to ProcessBuilder.

setDeleteOptions

public void setDeleteOptions(GitBranchOptions options,
                             boolean forceDelete,
                             boolean remote)
Sets the options for delete.

Parameters:
options - The GitBranchOptions object.
forceDelete - The forceDelete boolean flag. True if branch to be force deleted, false otherwise.
remote - The remote boolean flag. True if a remote branch is being deleted, false otherwise.
